Class DataTypeValidator

java.lang.Object
DataTypeValidator
public class DataTypeValidator extends Object
Low-level, field-centric checks (emptiness, numeric, ranges, dates).

      min - inclusive min
      max - inclusive max
      Returns:
      true if within [min, max]
